cinnamon.engine.utils

Class PolygonEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • cinnamon.engine.utils.PolygonEntity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AlignableEntity, Entity, MovableEntity, Partitionable, PivotableEntity, Position, RotatableEntity, Rotation, ScalableEntity, Size, Iterable<Polygon>

    public final class PolygonEntity
extends Object
implements AlignableEntity, ScalableEntity, RotatableEntity, PivotableEntity, Iterable<Polygon>

    Represents a transformable object composed of Polygons in a 3D space. Classes requiring a representation in a coordinate space should use an instance of this class to do so.

    Created by chris on 7/12/2017.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface cinnamon.engine.utils.AlignableEntity

        public boolean contains(Point point)

        Checks if a Point is contained within all Polygons.

        Parameters:
        point - point.
        Returns:
        true if point is within the area of at least one polygon.

      • rotateBy

        public void rotateBy(double angle)
        Description copied from interface: RotatableEntity

        Rotates by an angle from the current rotation.

        The Entity's pivot is used to form the origin around which rotation is performed i.e. position + pivot = rotation origin.

        Specified by:
        rotateBy in interface RotatableEntity
        Parameters:
        angle - in radians.

      • rotateTo

        public void rotateTo(double angle)
        Description copied from interface: RotatableEntity

        Rotates to an angle from a rotation of 0.

        The Entity's pivot is used to form the origin around which rotation is performed i.e. position + pivot = rotation origin.

        Specified by:
        rotateTo in interface RotatableEntity
        Parameters:
        angle - in radians.

      • scaleBy

        public void scaleBy(float horizontal,
                    float vertical)
        Description copied from interface: ScalableEntity

        Scales the Entity by some amount along the horizontal and vertical axes.

        The Entity's pivot is used to form the origin around which scaling is performed i.e. position + pivot = scale origin.

        Specified by:
        scaleBy in interface ScalableEntity
        Parameters:
        horizontal - factor along x axis.
        vertical - factor along y axis.
